hero.title: Buddy's Network
hero.description: A growing community of young people in Warsaw, where everyone can be both a mentor and a student. We create a space for mutual support and development.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: Supporting youth development through regular meetings, workshops and experience exchange

scholarships.title: Scholarships
scholarships.description: We're planning a scholarship program for talented youth from Eastern Europe. Currently working on securing funding and partners.

peerGroups.title: Peer Groups
peerGroups.description: Regular meetings of small groups (up to 10 people) twice a month. We share experiences, support each other and solve challenges together.

openEvents.title: Open Events
openEvents.description: We organize lectures, workshops and meetings with inspiring speakers on personal and professional development topics.

clubActivities.title: Club Activities
clubActivities.description: Informal events and educational games (Cashflow, Mafia) for our community integration.

about.title: A vision that's growing
about.description: Buddy's Network was born from the passion and vision of our founder, who believed that young people need a space for mutual support and growth. Thanks to his initiative, we've created a community connecting people from different countries and backgrounds.
about.mission: We started as a small group of friends in Warsaw. Today we're growing, planning new meeting formats and opening up to Polish and English-speaking communities. Our journey shows that great things start with small steps and a strong vision.
about.imageCaption: Thanks to our founder - together we create the future

growth.title: Mutual Growth
growth.description: Each of us brings something valuable - we are both teachers and students

support.title: Authentic Support
support.description: We create a safe space where people can share challenges and successes

community.title: Real Community
community.description: We connect people from different countries and backgrounds around shared goals

opportunity.title: New Opportunities
opportunity.description: We open doors to connections, knowledge and experiences that change lives

footer.description: A young foundation from Warsaw supporting youth development through peer-to-peer groups and open events.

events.subtitle: We meet regularly to grow together, share experiences, and build community

regular.title: Bi-Weekly Meetings
regular.description: Our peer groups meet regularly. Each meeting is an opportunity for conversation, experience sharing, and solving challenges together.

psychologist.title: Meeting with Psychologist
psychologist.description: Join us for a workshop on mental health, stress management, and building emotional resilience.

financial.title: Financial Literacy
financial.description: Workshop on personal finance basics, saving, and investing for young people.

future.title: Upcoming Topics
future.description: We're planning more meetings. What interests you?

founder.title: The Vision of Buddy's Network
founder.subtitle: The story that inspired the creation of a support community for young people

journey.title: Personal Experience
journey.description: Wład himself studied in Poland as an international student and perfectly understands the challenges young people from other countries face. This personal story showed him how important support and community are.

inspiration.title: Inspiration from His Son
inspiration.description: His greatest inspiration for creating the foundation was his son. Observing his growth and potential, Wład understood how important it is to create a space where young people can support and develop each other.

vision.title: Buddy's Network Mission
vision.description: His goal is to create a place where young people can learn something new, share knowledge and experiences, and build lasting relationships. Everyone can be both a student and a teacher.

founder.quote: The greatest value is a community where everyone can grow while helping others on their journey
